version_description:
- E-services : View blood donation appointments (HSA), view Children’s Health Records such as lab test results, discharge summary, appointments and etc.
- Quiz Time – learn fun and useful health info on the go.
- Bug fixes.

- New caregiver services for you to grant your caregiver, a next-of-kin, family member or friend, secure and convenient access to your health records so that they can help better manage your health
- Monitor your health vitals easily - input and track your own readings of Blood Glucose, Blood Pressure, and Body Mass Index (BMI). Patients who have enrolled in chronic disease management program via the public health institutions can use these vitals data to help manage their conditions.

• Keep track, monitor and celebrate your child’s growth with new features on Children’s Health section
o Record child's birth information
o Track his/her growth and key developmental milestones any time with easy-to-use features to measure height, weight and more
• Pick up new healthy habits with the new Track module
o Toggle between HealthHub and Track to enrol in health management programmes designed for Singaporeans
• General bug fixes and improvements for stability
• General bug fixes and improvements for stability.
• General bug fixes and improvements for stability.

•Celebrate and log your child’s growth, and receive helpful information as they reach developmental milestones
•Receive notifications when your child receives a School Dental Referral letter after a school check-up
•View your prescription records for the past 12 months
•General bug fixes and improvements for stability

•Celebrate and log your child’s growth, and receive helpful information as they reach developmental milestones
•Receive notifications when your child receives a School Dental Referral letter after a school check-up
•View your prescription records for the past 12 months
•General bug fixes and improvements for stability

Make/View/Change medical appointments 
Give consent to School Health and Dental Services
Exciting new rewards for members. Redeem HealthPoints for vouchers at participating merchants.
Improvements to School and Child Health services

Brand new homepage and menu layout giving you …
•Fast access to your desired health content
•Easy access to your health records and appointments
•Advanced personal health dashboard (when logged in via SingPass)

Request for a copy of your medical report via HealthHub for selected hospitals and make a direct debit payment for such report requests.

For parents, you can receive notifications on your children’s upcoming immunisation schedule on your smartphone and view the upcoming vaccinations for the next 6 months in HealthHub.
 Check your CHAS (Community Health Assist Scheme) subsidy balance and transaction history online and your caregivers can view them too if you have granted them consent.

Now, you can enjoy quicker access to your appointments, health records and more eServices via our highly-secure and readily accessible SingPass login.

Meanwhile you do not need to have a HealthHub account to access valuable health information resources without the need for signing up for an account.

For users of our Medical Records and Medication Refill eServices, more public healthcare institutions* are coming onboard, so keep an eye out!

Now, the HealthHub app allows you or your caregiver to get your queue number* for today’s appointment from home or on the go 1 hour before your booked appointment. Your e-itinerary shows the list of upcoming service stations you need to visit and view the number of patients in the queue so you spend less time in the waiting area.

* Currently available at National University Polyclinics, National Healthcare Group Polyclinics and Ng Teng Fong General Hospital.

Now, the HealthHub app allows you or your caregiver to get your queue number* for today's appointment from home or on the go 1 hour before your booked appointment. Your e-itinerary shows the list of upcoming service stations you need to visit and view the number of patients in the queue so you spend less time in the waiting area.

*Currently available at National University Polyclinics, National Healthcare Group Polyclinics and Ng Teng Fong General Hospital.

Now, you can book appointments for Khoo Teck Puat Hospital on HealthHub. If you are eligible for subsidised screening, you can also retrieve the soft copy invitation letter from HealthHub and receive push alerts for their screening invites.

Finally, you can get your medication refills* delivered to you using the HealthHub app. No more waiting at the pharmacy.

* Currently available at Tan Tock Seng Hospital and Ng Teng Fong General Hospital.

Now you can check your own immunisation records and get the appropriate immunisations today against infectious diseases.

Check your Screening Eligibility under the Screen for Life programme and easily view your eligibility for heavily subsidised screenings.

For users of our Medical Reports Request and Medication Refill eServices, more public healthcare institutions* are coming onboard, so keep an eye out!

Our new HealthHub Dashboard helps you locate existing and new healthcare services and content easily.

Now you can also access your current medication list and set reminders to take your medication on time.

Our new HealthHub Dashboard helps you locate existing and new healthcare services and content easily.

Now you can check your COVID-19 swab test results and retrieve the full report from HealthHub.
View your nationally-recommended vaccinations eligible for enhanced subsidies from 1 November 2020.

My Health Booklet : Access all your medical records and get customised health recommendations with just a few taps.
Appointments: View and schedule your appointments with National Skin Centre
Mobile Registration: Obtain your queue number and itinerary with National University Hospital.

HealthHub’s Covid-19 Records module allows you to check your vaccination records, and that of your loved ones. You can also view your test results and upcoming appointments for your next Covid-19 vaccination.

View and make payment for your medical bills across National Healthcare Group (NHG) and National University Health Systems (NUHS) institutions using HealthHub.

HealthHub allows you to check your vaccination records, and that of your loved ones. You can also view your test results and upcoming appointments for your next vaccination.

Your medical bills for National University Health Systems (NUHS) institutions can now be paid using HealthHub.

HealthHub allows you to check your vaccination records, and that of your loved ones. You can also view your test results and upcoming appointments for your next vaccination.

Your medical bills for National University Health Systems (NUHS) institutions can now be paid using HealthHub.
